company_commercial_names: heia-fr | haute école d'ingénierie et d'architecture de fribourg
short_description: heia-fr is a college/university based in fribourg, switzerland.
long_description: le comité de l'alumni heia-fr s'occupe principalement des aspects administratifs et de la gestion des ressources (contacts et finances). l'organisation d'évènements à destination des alumnis des filières est gérée par les commissions de filières. les commissions de filières, ou « commissions », se composent de 3 à 5 alumnis et d'un représentant de la filière (doyen, collaborateur ou professeur). votre partenaire pour la formation et l'innovation. six bachelor, quatre master hes-so et un diplôme de technicien·ne, la heia-fr propose un large éventail de formations, entre interdisciplinarité, théorie et pratique. the heia-fr offers a wide range of interdisciplinary study programs combining theory and practice, including six bachelor's degrees, four hes-so master's degrees and one advanced diploma for technicians.

generated_description: heia-fr, or the haute école d'ingénierie et d'architecture, is a higher education institution located in fribourg, switzerland. the institution offers a diverse range of interdisciplinary study programs, including bachelor's degrees, master's degrees, and advanced diplomas in various fields such as architecture, chemistry, civil engineering, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, computer science, and communication systems. heia-fr is also known for its pioneering applied research through several institutes, including the institute of chemical technology, the institute of applied research in energy systems, and the institute of artificial intelligence and complex systems. the institution emphasizes a balance between theoretical knowledge and practical application in its educational and research activities.
